title: Smart Agriculture Techniques: How Farmers Achieve High-Yield Cucumber Cultivation

tasks.task: Constructing and maintaining a greenhouse for melon cultivation
subtasks: Design and build a sturdy steel frame for the greenhouse
Install UV-resistant polyethylene film covering
Set up ventilation and temperature control systems
Prepare enriched soil and plant melon seeds/seedlings
Install automatic drip irrigation systems
Monitor and adjust soil moisture and nutrient levels
Apply organic or bio fertilizers
Regularly check plants and prune as needed
Implement manual or bee pollination for fruit production
Monitor and control pests and diseases

tasks.task: Harvesting and post-harvest processing of melons
subtasks: Handpick ripened melons to prevent damage
Inspect harvested melons for quality and defects
Sort melons by size, color, and shape
Pack melons into boxes or bags with ventilation holes
Transport packed melons to markets and distribution centers

tasks.task: Managing the greenhouse environment for optimal melon growth
subtasks: Adjusting lighting with LED supplements as needed
Monitoring and maintaining optimal temperature and humidity levels
Ensuring proper airflow and ventilation
Optimizing irrigation and nutrient delivery systems
Transferring pollen manually or managing honeybee colonies
Monitoring pollen transfer and managing plant flowering
Pruning plants to direct nutrients to fruit growth
